profile_summary:
As a proficient Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in leveraging **Python** for developing high-performance solutions within the cloud landscape, specifically utilizing **AWS** and **Azure** services. My technical prowess extends into **Machine Learning**, where I have successfully designed and implemented ML pipelines, ensuring effective model deployment in production environments.
My background in full-stack development is robust, equipped with knowledge in modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Node.js**. I focus on building scalable applications supported by a strong foundation in database management and cloud architecture. I have demonstrated a clear ability to enhance enterprise systems by integrating AI solutions for data analytics and intelligent automation.
Additionally, I am experienced with microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, which enables me to develop secure applications compliant with standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. With a commitment to continuous improvement, I embrace the latest technologies and methodologies to drive project success.
